author: Andrew Payne
comment: This is my daily watchface. Looked great on my LG Urbane....and looks even better on my Huewai W1 ....simply the best. I have read the negative comments and have to disagree. In my experience having used the watchface for a few months, the weather works perfectly in London UK; I like simple hands and the peek card sits perfectly under the digital display on my Huewai.  5 stars.
title: The best

author: Howard Bamber
comment: Another crap, lazy watch. Could be good if care went into the hands and instead of telling me the same time twice allowed me to set up the digital myself to a timezone. No problem in LUA. Waste of an opportunity. Money back. Change and I'll pay again.
title: LAZY

author: Bryce Wilson
comment: A watch face that is clean, classy, full featured and has everything I've been looking for! Perfection!  Only hiccup I've found is that when the watch goes out of range of the phone, the icon that pops up displays on top of the day/date. Other than that I love this face!  Good job guys!
title: FINALLY!!!!

author: Mark Smith
comment: The weather never updates so it should have an option to display or not display the weather.  It shows 31 deg and has done so since it was installed. Perhaps the ability to select location may assist.  Rest is good but let down by this
title: Bad weather details

author: Gonzalo Capozio
comment: Weather definitely not working, whichever weather source or refresh time you choose. Please fix this, since its one of the main face features. Using on Moto 360 2nd gen
title: Ok, but a few bugs

author: Azzbelp
comment: Best watch face out, both anolog and  the digit time displays, watch and battery displays, smooth, sleek design.                                                      Only downfall is the phone battery percentage goes out of sync now and then.  Running a Huawei watch, other then that great all round and best designed watch face.
title: Everything you need in a watch face

author: Tyson
comment: All in all its a good looking watch face, however it has some flaws, every time the phone switches to ambient or to normal mode, the way home hands run from 12:00 to the relevant time, does it going into ambient as well as normal mode, very irritating. Also I think the lines around the outside of the face should have the option to be hidden, I have a G watch R, it has its own lines, very irritating.
title: Needs work

author: Joseph Allen
comment: AMAZINGNESS. beautiful face on my Zenwatch 2. My ONLY COMPLAINT is the ambient mode. It's super pixelated displaying the month and date. Super ugly. Wouldn't mind having an option to turn the date off in ambient mode or smoothing it out. Whichever would be easier on your end? Hell if I know, I'm not a dev.

author: Hendrikkus Hendrikkus
comment: Hai, in My moto 360 2nd Gen the Phone Battery indicator not showing the correct level. Please fixed and you will get My 5 stars.
title: Phone Battery Indicator Not Correct

author: James M
comment: Just wish the battery indicators were in the center on the left and right side instead of at the bottom. Wish the small peek card didn't block the digital time or move the digital time up a hair so the small peak card does not block the view of the digital time. Also, the date is hard to see and needs to be brighter. It would be greatly appreciated if I can see all the information at one time without having to move something out of the way.
title: Elegant And Modern At The Same Time.

author: Paymon Azizi
comment: This watch face is really nice when the screen is fully on, however, it looks terrible when it is on ambient mode. It would be good if they gave options to customize that or even if they made it simpler for ambient mode.
title: Sucks for ambient mode, otherwise nice

author: Niraj Nain
comment: Love it especially the amount of information shown in Ambient Mode which a lot of watch faces fall down on. I'd give it 5 stars if you could show steps instead of battery life as an option and the ability to have animation ONLY when the screen turns on rather than it also happening when turning off which is a bit too much.
title: Excellent

author: Brett Inman
comment: please make temp and battery percentage bigger. possibly twice the size they are. they are hard to see without glasses. otherwise, very elegant and nice watch face. good work.
title: nice on zenwatch

author: Ilyass Karouach
comment: I had doubts the watch face might not look as good as it does on the pictures, I got it and it's now my favorite watch-face so far, it's got everything you need in one place and the design and animations are absolutely wonderful...truly glad I came upon this one!!

author: Blake hmm
comment: While looking for a nice watch face to match the beautiful moto 360 2nd gen I came upon this. At first sight I feel in love with it but I saw on ambient mode that it was do a weird graphic glitch. That was fixed with a simple restart and change the watch face to any other one and back again. I am in love with it.
title: My favorites watch face

author: Jeff Martinson
comment: Would get a refund if I could. The battery indicator for the phone doesn't stay up-to-date, and the font for the battery indicator is way too small, it's hard to see. Also tapping the center of the watch face changes its colors, this is stupid, this should only be done on the phone app, its way to easy to accidentally change the color.
title: Waste of money

author: Shaun Allan
comment: I really like this watch face. It's one of my favourites. The date could be a bit bigger though as it's hard to read at current size.
title: Great

author: Adam Fisher
comment: First couple of days, weather was updating but now it's stopped. Location on etc, but just doesn't update. (Even when trying to force update the weather)
title: Weather stopped working

author: Mark Haven
comment: This is the second time I am rating down a watch face I love made by this company simply because it stopped working... it has not updated weather temp for 2 weeks... tried all settings, nothing works.
title: Loved it until...

author: Zach Champion
comment: It's amazing but I would like to be able to customize the ambient mode screen (remove number indicators or the analog/digital mode entirely, hide the weather, etc.)
title: Customize Ambient Mode

author: Julian Croot
comment: Everything I want and nothing I don't whilst looking nice and filling the square display on my Smartwatch 3.  Only wish is that the battery level displays were bigger.
title: My new favourite.

author: Kevin Bayless
comment: Really like the clean look of this watch face.  Would be 5 stars if there was an option to turn off the colored band that follows the second hand.  Takes away from the understated look IMO.

author: Viktor Kery
comment: I've been looking for a simple watch design for my Huawei Watch. Tried many free and some paid too. This is the closest face for a watch with all necessary information I would need. All works fine, lots of customisable features, etc. I think it worth its money.

author: Johnny Martinez
comment: Doesn't work on the Android Wear 2.0 This app hasn't been updated since 2015.

author: András Oláh
comment: Simple but great. I wish the font size could be increased for the battery status indicators and the digital clock turned off in settings

author: rick meyer
comment: I don't usually do reviews but this is one of the best watch faces I own.. Well worth the money.. Treat yourself and get this
title: Awesome

author: Ashley Margrove
comment: Easy to use, suits my style and has all the relevant information along with a sweeping seconds hand. Recommend it. Would like to see some themes im a future update though!
title: Perfectly beautiful.

author: Steve Stavropoulos
comment: Please fix Yahoo weather. It works in your other watch faces like "Power", but not here! I'll update the review to 5 stars after you fix it.
title: Yahoo weather not working

author: Brandon Hill
comment: The watch looks nice.  But the weather refuses to update.
title: Excellent looking watch

author: Andrew Sharples
comment: The best yet not sure what other reviewers watches are but on mine this is the very best, high resolution, perfect reactions just beautiful
title: Huawei W1

author: Spencer Shifflett
comment: Other than that perfect.
title: Kinda annoying when the tickers are over the digital clock

author: Faris Mas
comment: Why digital and analog at the same time without an option to disable one of them!!!
title: Disappointing

author: Julius Nguyen
comment: This is my favorite watch face for my Hauwei watch but it crashes a lot?!? Can you guys address?!?

author: david papst
comment: So far the best one I have now. Easy to read and great animations. Great on battery as well. -Moto 360 OG
title: My new daily face

author: Zed
comment: It would be nice to be able to customize the area with battery percentages, and put something like steps or sunset there instead.
title: It's okay

author: 9930sam
comment: Can be perfect if the digital watch showed another time zone, and touching the date opened the calendar app.
title: Looks good,

author: mishu een
comment: Is the best out there. However i would disable dial coloring
title: Can you add option to disable colors on the dial?

author: M Ashi
comment: Ambient mode not colored

author: Yaari Amar
comment: Great app, looks good and works good , instead of the phone battery icon, it's not showing the right battery precetage of the phone

author: Richard Hodges
comment: This is a good watch face with a pleasant design and just the right amount of customisation.
title: Faithful and inoffensive
